text:
Pyotr Petrovitch arrived in Petersburg, uneasy. 

“Will they expose me?” he wondered. 

He sought Andrey Semyonovitch for answers. 

Andrey was a small man, proud of his whiskers. 

“I know the latest ideas,” he boasted. 

Pyotr frowned. 

“Do they have power?” he asked. 

Andrey nodded, his eyes gleaming. 

“Progress is everything,” he declared. 

Pyotr felt a chill. 

“Can I win them over?” he thought. 

Questions swirled in his mind. 

Andrey spoke on, oblivious. 

Pyotr listened, calculating his next move.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pyotr Petrovitch is anxious about the influence of the younger generation and seeks to navigate their potential power while relying on the simple-minded Andrey Semyonovitch for guidance.
